question: Bring out theÂ qualitative control instrument of Reserve Bank of India from the given statements?
option1: RBI increases Reverse Repo rate in the quarterly review of the monetary policy
option2: RBI decreases the CRR rate in the quarterly review of the monetary policy
option3: RBI decreases the Bank rate in the quarterly review of the monetary policy
option4: RBI announces selective credit control in the quarterly review of the monetary policy
answer: RBI announces selective credit control in the quarterly review of the monetary policy
